title_onboarding_4: Stay Connected and Access Your Records
description_onboarding_1: Get medical care anytime, anywhere. Our app is designed with a user-friendly interface to ensure a seamless experience in accessing healthcare services.
description_onboarding_2: Easily book appointments with specialized doctors. Browse by specialty and location to find the best fit for your needs with ease and flexibility.
description_onboarding_3: Track your health continuously with tools in the app. Manage schedules, view results, and get reminders for appointments to stay on top of your health.
description_onboarding_4: Stay connected with your healthcare providers and access your medical records anytime. Manage your medical history securely and efficiently.
description_login: We're excited to have you back! Let's pick up where you left off.
logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
description_change_password: Change your password to keep your account secure.
description_register: Sign up now to explore everything our app has to offer. We're thrilled to have you join us!
by_logging_in: By logging in, you agree to our
description_forgot_password: We prioritize the security of your information. Reset your password safely and quickly.
pin_description: Add a PIN number to make your account more secure and easy to sign in.
